src:
世耕氏「大人の新婚生活は良いものだ」…菊池桃子さんと結婚の新原氏は「大変な仕事師」

05 Nov 2019, 09:46

　自民党の世耕弘成参院幹事長は５日の記者会見で、経済産業省の新原浩朗（ひろあき）経済産業政策局長（６０）とタレントの菊池桃子さん（５１）の結婚について、「大人の新婚生活は良いものだ」と述べ、祝意を示した。
　世耕氏は５０歳だった２０１３年９月、林久美子・民主党参院議員（当時）と再婚した。９月まで経済産業相を務めており、新原氏は元部下にあたる。世耕氏は新原氏について「大変な仕事師だ」と評価。「彼が結婚すること自体、大変な驚きだったが、お相手を聞いて千倍くらい驚いた」とも語った。
text:
Mr. Seko “The newlywed life of adults is good”… Mr. Kikochi and Mr. Niihara, who is married, are “hard workers”

05 Nov 2019, 09:46

Mr. Hironari Seko, Director General of the Liberal Democratic Party, said at the press conference on the 5th about the marriage between Hiroaki Niihara, Director-General for Economic and Industrial Policy, Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (60) and Momoko Kikuchi (51), the talent. Was a good thing.
In September 2013, Seko remarried to Kumiko Hayashi, a member of the Democratic House of Representatives at that time. Mr. Niihara is the former subordinate, serving as Minister of Economy, Trade and Industry until September. Mr. Seko evaluated Mr. Niihara as “a hard worker”. “It was a great surprise for him to get married, but I was surprised about a thousand times when I heard him.”
